dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? A-an annual 10% inflation? Ten percent?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? A-an annual ten percent inflation? Ten percent?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the year, it was 10% (in February - 9.4%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, actually, if you look at the monthly consumer price index, it, uh, it actually went down. Like, it was 1.5% in February and now it's 1.3%.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, actually, if you look at the monthly consumer price index, it, uh, it actually went down. Like, it was one point five percent in February and now it's one point three percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the National Statistics Bureau, the monthly consumer price index in March was 1.3% (in February it was 1.5%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Monthly? Are you kidding? It says right here inflation accelerated over the year. From 9.4% to ten percent! That's not, like, good news, Bob.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Monthly? Are you kidding? It says right here inflation accelerated over the year. From nine point four percent to ten percent! That's not, like, good news, Bob.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Inflation in Kazakhstan has accelerated. Over the year, it was 10% (in February - 9.4%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, uh, I mean, some things got cheaper! Liquefied gas, for example, is down by, like, 23%. And firewood, almost fifteen percent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, uh, I mean, some things got cheaper! Liquefied gas, for example, is down by, like, twenty three percent. And firewood, almost fifteen percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A price reduction was also recorded for liquefied gas in cylinders, by 23%, and firewood by 14.8%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Firewood, Bob? Really? Most people aren't, like, heating their homes with firewood. And what about services? Up 14.3% annually! Utilities went up significantly!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Firewood, Bob? Really? Most people aren't, like, heating their homes with firewood. And what about services? Up fourteen point three percent annually! Utilities went up significantly!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Prices for paid services over the year increased by 14.3%... Over the year, utility tariffs have increased significantly:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're just focusing on, um, the worst bits though, aren't you? Like, you're not seeing the whole picture. Food, for instance, only 7.6%.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just focusing on, um, the worst bits though, aren't you? Like, you're not seeing the whole picture. Food, for instance, only seven point six percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Prices for paid services over the year increased by 14.3%, non-food products by 9.1%, and food products by 7.6%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Only 7.6% for food?! That's a huge hit to, like, household budgets! Essential goods also increased, it says. This isn't, uh, just 'some bits'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Only seven point six percent for food?! That's a huge hit to, like, household budgets! Essential goods also increased, it says. This isn't, uh, just 'some bits'.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Essential goods also increased in price:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the monthly trend, uh, is down. That's a positive sign, you know? It shows, um, things are cooling off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the monthly trend, uh, is down. That's a positive sign, you know? It shows, um, things are cooling off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the monthly consumer price index in March was 1.3% (in February it was 1.5%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Cooling off when annual inflation accelerated to double digits? And Astana is at 13.3%? That's, like, a disaster for people living there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cooling off when annual inflation accelerated to double digits? And Astana is at thirteen point three percent? That's, like, a disaster for people living there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the regions, the highest annual inflation was in Astana (13.3%)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but that's just, um, Astana. Pavlodar region was, like, 6.9%. You can't just pick the highest number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but that's just, um, Astana. Pavlodar region was, like, six point nine percent. You can't just pick the highest number.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the lowest was in the Pavlodar region (6.9%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, I'm not picking. The overall trend, the annual figure, it's up. It's, uh, higher than last month's annual figure. That's acceleration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I'm not picking. The overall trend, the annual figure, it's up. It's, uh, higher than last month's annual figure. That's acceleration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Inflation in Kazakhstan has accelerated. Over the year, it was 10% (in February - 9.4%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're just choosing to ignore the, like, the mitigating factors. The fact that the monthly rate slowed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just choosing to ignore the, like, the mitigating factors. The fact that the monthly rate slowed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the monthly consumer price index in March was 1.3% (in February it was 1.5%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I'm not ignoring it, I'm saying it's not the main story here. The main story is people are paying ten percent more than a year ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm not ignoring it, I'm saying it's not the main story here. The main story is people are paying ten percent more than a year ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the year, it was 10% (in February - 9.4%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, uh, yeah, but it's not all doom and gloom. It's, um, nuanced.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, uh, yeah, but it's not all doom and gloom. It's, um, nuanced.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nuanced? I'd call it, like, significantly worse for most people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nuanced? I'd call it, like, significantly worse for most people.
